duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with nursing leaders to identify areas of growth and development, and create new development plans for WHS leaders that aligns with organizational goals
Facilitate the smooth integration of new OB nurse leaders, and head nurses
Provide high quality patient care, adherence to policies and procedures, best practical and achievement of departmental goals
Play a pivotal role in the transition of newly hired maternal child health nurse leadership
Guide healthcare professionals to ensure high quality patient care and achievement of departmental goals with a focus in nursing education

education_certification.credential: Masters Degree in Nursing Administration, Education, Clinical Specialty or equivalent field and five years of satisfactory nursing experience, of which three years shall have been in a supervisory or teaching capacity; or a Baccalaureate Degree in Nursing and six years of satisfactory nursing experience, four years of which shall have been in a supervisory or teaching capacity
